channel.title: One Minute Russian
channel.itunes:summary: Join Russian teacher Ann as she teaches you the basics of Russian. In this podcast you'll be learning just enough Russian to get by on a holiday or business trip to Russia - and to impress Russian speakers everywhere! Each lesson includes just over one minute of language-learning content, so there's no excuse not to learn! Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more.
channel.itunes:author: Radio Lingua Network
channel.description: Join Russian teacher Ann as she teaches you the basics of Russian. In this podcast you'll be learning just enough Russian to get by on a holiday or business trip to Russia - and to impress Russian speakers everywhere! Each lesson includes just over one minute of language-learning content, so there's no excuse not to learn! Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn Russian in minutes with the Radio Lingua Network

item.title: Radio Lingua Network News: 26 September 2008
item.description: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners! By way of joining in this international celebration of languages and language-learning we're delighted to introduce eight new podcasts today. We're adding Catalan, Danish, French, Japanese, Mandarin and Romanian to our One Minute Languages series; we're introducing our first podcast for English learners - Write Back Soon will help learners master Phrasal Verbs; and we're finally announcing the long-awaited sequel to Coffee Break Spanish: it's Show Time!
item.content:encoded: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners! By way of joining in this international celebration of languages and language-learning we're delighted to introduce eight new podcasts today. We're adding Catalan, Danish, French, Japanese, Mandarin and Romanian to our One Minute Languages series; we're introducing our first podcast for English learners - Write Back Soon will help learners master Phrasal Verbs; and we're finally announcing the long-awaited sequel to Coffee Break Spanish: it's Show Time!
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners

item.title: Radio Lingua Network News: 5 September 2008
item.description: The latest news from Radio Lingua including details of Coffee Break Spanish arrangements, new podcasts launched this autumn and the Radio Lingua video contest in which you can win an iPod.
item.content:encoded: The latest news from Radio Lingua including details of Coffee Break Spanish arrangements, new podcasts launched this autumn and the Radio Lingua video contest in which you can win an iPod.
item.itunes:subtitle: The latest news from Radio Lingua

item.title: Lesson 10 - One Minute Russian
item.description:
In lesson 10 of One Minute Russian you will learn a few useful phrases which all learners want to learn. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Russian on our website at http://www.oneminutelanguages.com.
One Minute Russian is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.

item.title: Can't wait to download weekly shows? Find out more by listening...
item.description: Find out how you can get the whole course now and benefit from the enhanced version of each podcast with synchronised flashcards and a lesson guide featuring all vocabulary and pronunciation tips. The premium version of this course is available now in our store at http://www.radiolingua.com/store/

item.itunes:subtitle: Get the complete One Minute Russian series now

item.title: Promo - One Minute Russian
item.description: Hello - zdrastvuitye! My name is Ann and I'd like to welcome you to One Minute Russian from the Radio Lingua Network. In this podcast I'm going to be teaching you the basics of Russian. The great thing about this language course is that you'll be learning all you need to know in 60 seconds - or thereabouts! Each one minute language lesson will equip you with just enough Russian to help you get by in lots of situations, either on holiday, or on a business trip to a Russian-speaking country, or just to impress your Russian-speaking friends or colleagues. Our course will be starting very soon. In the meantime, visit our website on http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
item.content:encoded: Hello - zdrastvuitye! My name is Ann and I'd like to welcome you to One Minute Russian from the Radio Lingua Network. In this podcast I'm going to be teaching you the basics of Russian. The great thing about this language course is that you'll be learning all you need to know in 60 seconds - or thereabouts! Each one minute language lesson will equip you with just enough Russian to help you get by in lots of situations, either on holiday, or on a business trip to a Russian-speaking country, or just to impress your Russian-speaking friends or colleagues. Our course will be starting very soon. In the meantime, visit our website on http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Find out more about One Minute Russian
